casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1942.

(January 13, 1942.) Esther Heller and Others and Minnie Mandelker v. Richard J. Boylan and Others, Impleaded, etc., and John W. Giesecke and Others.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals or for a reargument and for a stay denied. Present — O’Malley, Townley, Glennon, Cohn and Callahan, JJ.
